<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Modifying the cmdb_datasource_last_update class and adding indexes</description> <name>Modify cmdb_datasource_last_update </name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[ gs.log('Fix Script: Running fix script to modify the columns for cmdb_data_source_last_update'); var modifyColumn = new ModifyColumnsForCMDBDataSourceLastUpdate(); modifyColumn.scheduleModifyDictionary(); gs.log('Fix Script: Scheduled modify columns for the cmdb_data_source_last_update table');
gs.log("Fix Script: Starting to schedule index creation for cmdb_datasource_last_update"); var indexCreator = new AddIndexesForCMDBTables(); indexCreator.createIndex('cmdb_datasource_last_update', 'record, attribute', 'record_attribute_index'); gs.log("Fix Script: Scheduled index creation for cmdb_datasource_last_update"); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-10-20 20:55:19</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7ec1dceb7362511007d56ad9af148b74</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Modify cmdb_datasource_last_update </sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">8f64bce83c31311068bcf327dfe37f7e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_7ec1dceb7362511007d56ad9af148b74</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-11-10 20:56:59</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
